testsuite.name: newpackage.Firefox
testsuite.system-out: Step-1: Go to amazon.ca The amazon.ca webpage was opened successfully.
Step-2: Click on hamburger menu (top left corner) The hamburger menu was clicked successfully.
Step-3: Select Kindle under Digital Content and Devices Kindle was selected under Digital Content and devices.
Step-4: Click Kindle under Kindle E-Reader Kindle option was selected under kindle e-reader section successfully.
Step-5: Click Buy Now Buy Now option was clicked successfully from the kindle product page.
Step-6: Verify User is asked for email or mobile number The User is asked for email or mobile number after clicking on 'buy now' button
